name: Yanmamon
description: Yanmamon's design is derived from the jumbo dragonfly ( Anotogaster sieboldii ). It has two arms that each end in a single grey talon and four legs. It has a pair of large, green eyes with a pair of smaller, green eyes between them and three-toothed mandibles on the sides of its mouth. It is brownish yellow in coloration with black muscle in the brachium of its arms and its thighs.
